attributes.action: Allow 16 year old’s to have a vote in important elections like BREXIT
attributes.additional_details: The age to vote is 18 which allows you to vote for anything, but in certain cases like BREXIT it affects a teenagers future more then it does an older person so why not allow them to have a say in their future in important matters like that.
attributes.background: BREXIT effects the future of the country and teenagers are the future so allowing them to vote on important things like it would give them a voice on their future.
